alert.note: Alert for Brown; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:25PM CDT until May 07 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Rock County in north central Nebraska... East central Brown County in north central Nebraska... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 725 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ainsworth, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Long Pine, Newport, Pony Lake, Sybrant, Antelope Peak and Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 165 and 200. Highway 20 between mile markers 236 and 273. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
